body.name: iPEGTOP Expandable Dish Drying Rack with Rustproof Stainless Steel Utensil Cutlery Holder, Over Sink Dish Rack Basket Shelf, Dish Drainer in Sink or On Counter

Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 51 mins
features: ✔ SPACE SAVER - This dish drying rack expands for use on the counter, in the sink or over the sink.
✔ SUPERIOR QUALITY - Made from sturdy bold Stainless Steel ensure long lasting durability. Non slip extendable rubber arms and feet protects the counter and sink from scratches.
✔ EXTENDABLE SIZE - The unit (collapsed) measures 15" L x 12" W x 3.5" H, expands from 15" to 22" wide to make it handy to place over a larger sink, please test the size of your sink before purchase.
✔ Metal UTENSIL HOLDER - All-Mesh design silverware holder, to make your utensils stay in the basket, not slip out any more. Let this dish drainer rack more fits your kitchen sink or cupboard.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: To make sure this drying rack works, PLEASE BE SURE TO MEASURE THE SIZE OF YOUR SINK BEFORE PURCHASING! Why choosing iPEGTOP Over Sink Drying Rack ? iPEGTOP sink dish drying rack is made of 304 stainless steel bold wire which simply means, it's not going to rust. There may be cheaper options on amazon but those will be made from chrome or a cheap stainless steel that will, within a few weeks, turn into a rusty mess.

To make sure this drying rack works, PLEASE BE SURE TO MEASURE THE SIZE OF YOUR SINK BEFORE PURCHASING! Dish rack size is 15" L x 12" W x 3.5" H (collapsed), expand to 22" length (two handles fully pulled out). If you use it over the sink or in the sink, make sure your sink is larger than dish rack, sink width should be more than 15" and less than 22". Sink dish caddy with adjustable arms, fits most sink which is 15 to 22 inches width.

Rubber Feet protector Avoid leaving any scratches: with slip-resistant rubber on the bar and four on the feet, perfectly protect your sink and counter. Extendable Arms Extendable handles with Non-slip rubber arms to keep the rack steady in place and also protect your sink and counter. Plates holder Brand new with 304 food grade stainless steel bold wire, rustproof and durable. With slots, the sink dish drainer can hold up 7 dishes.
On Counter Top Over the sink In the sink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solidly built and easy to move around
reviews.reviewText: This is just what we needed for our new sink. We didn't have to worry about size. It expanded to fit perfectly. Silverware basket is nice to have. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect in my sink
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It fits perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used In big open farmers sink and it solves my problem!
reviews.reviewText: We have a big farmers sink - It is a good quality sink that came with the house but I like a sink that is divided. This helps solve my problem somewhat. It holds dishes and cups up off the bottom of the sink and still use the sink on the other side witout getting the things in this basket wet. It is a simple metal basket design. The rubber lets hold it in place well and doesn't scratch the sink. And it doesn't rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits our double sink great
reviews.reviewText: Our home is from the 70s and was recently remodeled about 5 years ago but they left the traditional steel double sink in the kitchen which is frustrating for drying dishes. This rack fits perfectly. It actually is a little small so we used to the adjusters on it with ease and it holds lots of things. The silverware rack can be moved to either side as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT Rust
reviews.reviewText: This dish drained is amazing. I wanted a metal one that doesn’t rust and get nasty looking. We live in Florida and things don’t dry well. Absolutely love that after several purchases I finally found one that truly does not rust. It’s been 2 years since my purchase and still going strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I hate the utensil holder
reviews.reviewText: It's small but feels sturdy and well made. I like the plate part but I absolutely hate the utensil holder. They should have used smaller spacing between the mesh because the end of the utensils are constantly going through the space on the sides and then get stuck when trying to pull a bunch out at once. I don't want to have to consciously think about placing them in absolutely perfectly every time. And while I like 3 sections for utensils, the unit is too small for 3 sections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fit perfectly in the sink! Great quality! Nice and simple design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I took a chance on this product even though the price was a little expensive compared to most. It was worth it. It looks great in my stainless steel sink. It has a lot of room for dishes and silverware and I love the separate basket for the silverware. It is fully adjustable, so it fit perfect over my sink. would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and attractive! Very happy with this product. Have had it now for several months and put all sorts of dishes in it. Holding up great!
機能的には悪くないのですが、高さがあまりなく大きなお皿など置く場所を考えないと不安定だと思います箸立ては隙間が広いのでよく滑り落ちます支えのシリコンゴムがすぐ外れます少人数の台所ならとても便利だと思います

reviews.reviewTitle: After having this for almost a year now..
reviews.reviewText: I waited to review this product after using it for a long time to see if it rusts. I am happy to report that it has not rusted. It fits perfectly over my sink. Easy to clean except for the 4 black rubber legs which should have been upside down so as not to keep water inside it all the time but it is not a big deal. Sturdy and has NOT rusted which is very important. My total came to $75 which is way too expensive for a dish rack (with free shipping). But I just wanted something that won't rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This drainer looks very smart on our white china draining board and seems to hold more than its size would suggest.
